properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 13 at 2:22PM PST until February 14 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Rough bar conditions expected.

- GENERAL SEAS...6 to 8 ft today and tonight building to 10 to
12 ft Friday morning.

- FIRST EBB...Around 8 PM Thursday. Seas to 10 ft.

- SECOND EBB...Strong around 845 AM Friday. Seas to 12 ft.

* WHERE...In the Main Channel of the Columbia River Bar.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to
midnight PST tonight. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM
to 10 PM PST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft
especially when navigating in or near harbor entrances.
properties.instruction:
Small craft should use extreme caution when navigating in or near
harbor entrances.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY
